First, we need to find out how many slices are remaining after baking cookies. We know that Mary starts with three dozen eggs (which means 3*12=36) and uses six to make omelets. This leaves her with 36-6=30 eggs. Out of these 30 eggs, half are sold while preparing dinner so only 30/2=15 eggs are kept aside. Hence, initially leaving behind 30-(3+6)=15 eggs ready to be used later. Next month, John plans to double them which implies doubling current amount i.e., 15x2 = 30 eggs saved next time around. But wait, before adding anything new, Peter removes four cracked eggs from existing stockpile leading to  15-4=11 fresh raw egg available immediately. 1.subquestion: How many large apple slices do I get if I cut one large apple into five equal parts?

subanswer.text: One large apple divided into 5 equals yields 5 slices per apple. The answer is 5.

2.subquestion: Question about Text Analysis (not related): In what way could an understanding of textual analysis benefit someone looking to improve their communication skills or interpret written content effectively?

subanswer.text: Understanding textual analysis enables individuals to break down complex texts into smaller components like phrases, sentences, and words; identify key elements such as tone, mood, structure, purpose, audience intentions, rhetorical devices used, etc., leading to improved comprehension. This insight helps not just during reading but also when writing since they become aware of these underlying features influencing meaning creation within any piece of literature or discourse thereby improving overall effectiveness & accuracy in conveying messages across various mediums — digital platforms being no exception . Additionally , mastery over techniques involved facilitates critical thinking abilities – allowing recipients evaluate arguments critically based solely upon evidence provided vs personal beliefs thus ensuring better decision making processes both personally professionally alike ! With proper practice however practitioners should continuously hone said skill set alongside other relevant areas under review keeping up current trends changing times accordingly maintain relevance throughout career lifecycle hence position oneself well ahead competition wise..

Firstly let us calculate the number of slices obtained from both types of apples before any was eaten. From your description it seems you meant 'pieces'. We interpret this as follows;
A large apple yields 5 slices. This means if Adam cut up seven thousand six hundred thirty-five twenty sixth apples all together yield seventy five million fourteen thousands twelve fifty slices ((7635260)*(5)). And since every smaller apple when chopped renders ninety one parts or approximately  8 times bigger than piece coming off a larger apple , thus resulting roughly around ten point eleven part per single small fruit ; meaning these provide about fifteen trillion thirty zero billion two hundred seventy sevens [(5*7035260)]. As such upon calculating, combined efforts would amount unto approximately [seventy six billion eight hundred thirty one millions] plus another [fifteen trillion ] equals [thirteen quintillion], being summed over original amounts .
